content: Hi, I have a finitely supported map for the coefficients of a linear combination of vectors. Its domain is Sum A Unit, and I want to restrict it to just A. This is so I can use the restriction (also a finitely supported function) to define the linear combination of a subfamily of vectors, with one less vector. Any ideas how to proceed?
